name: nativescript-google-maps-sdk
description: Google Maps SDK plugin for Nativescript
author: Dan Prietti <dprietti@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dapriett)

scripts.lint.all: npm run lint.ts && npm run lint.dist
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-google-maps-sdk && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" ns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" ns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage: Please fix your commit message to match format.  For help, execute 'npm run cm'
